title: U.S., Other Foreign Donors Pledge Billions in Aid to Afghanistan
sub_head: Kabul draws about $3 billion in pledges for 2021, depending on progress of peace talks with Taliban
body:
The U.S., European Union and other international donors pledged billions of dollars in aid to war-torn Afghanistan, but said disbursement would depend on progress in talks between Kabul and the Taliban to end nearly two decades of fighting.
Over 100 countries and organizations committed about $3 billion in total development support to Afghanistan for 2021 at a quadrennial aid conference in Geneva, which was hosted virtually by the United Nations, Finland and Afghanistan this year due to the coronavirus pandemic. Annual commitments...
